name: Bruxelles Illustrations Set
description:
For 12 years, Streamline has made the largest, most consistent illustration sets on the internet.


Bruxelles is a new set, inspired by the 'Ligne claire' style popularized by the Belgian comic 'Tintin'. It focuses on the beauty and simplicity of line drawings, keeping the colors light and subtle.
